title: Our mission
subtitle: WHAT ABOUT ANIMALS?
text: Fight against animal cruelty â€“ one of our major goals. By the end of 2022, we are planning to donate $1 000 000 (20% of the profit) in funds like NAVS (The National Anti-Vivisection Society), IFAV (The International Fund for Animal Welfare), WWF (The Worldwide Fund for Nature), CellStandard with whom we are planning long-term partnership in future.
